tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Breast Examination,Vaginal Infection Treatment,Pregnancy Check Up,PCOD/PCOS Treatment,
review: She is just amazing as a doctor and as a human too. She’ll listen patiently to all your concerns and will make you understand the cause and treatment briefly. You’ll feel so much comfortable with her. Just don't doubt to visit her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Doctor Neena Bahl is a very professional, patient * ************* ******* We consulted her for the birth of our first baby. She answered all our questions, medical as well as personal, in the most reassuring & thorough way.
She has got the knack of explaining the most complex things in a simple & crystal clear manner. We had to undergo a C-section as there were certain complications, but she guided us through all that and finally, my wife delivered a healthy baby on the D-day.
We would be forever thankful to her. I think, in hindsight, it was the best decision to consult her for our child's birth!

tags: None
review: She is very nice and humble doctor.   I am fully satisfied treatment.  She listen problem and then she describes what is the reason behind our problem.    Its very  good thing in actually now i know what is the reason of my problem.  *** ** **** *******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,

review: We consulted Dr Neena before planning our first child and we highly appreciate the way she guided us in the right direction since the beginning till the very last moment of pregnancy. Highly recommend her!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor is amazing while explaining everything in detail and listens to all your problems with very much quietly. I totally recommend dr.neena bahl

tags: None
review: This is my 6th year with Dr. Neena Bahl. She has been a best advisor for me along with her ********* treatment. I will recommend her to everyone.

tags: Wait time,
review: She is the most fabulous doctor . She listens to you and never creates panic in any circumstance . Above all no matter how busy she is , she always responds which as a patient I feel is the best quality . Thank you for always being there .

review: She is a very nice doctor..sha handled my complicated endometriosis cyst very well..  She helped me throughout  the process by proper guidance and motivation.  I highly recommended her.
